text: Mikoto, can I talk to you for a moment?

I was thinking it might be time to practice in your stage
outfits, so I brought them. Want to try them on?

Oh... Yeah, actually,
I was just thinking I wanted to check them.

Well, that's good. Go ahead and try them on right away.
If there are any adjustments needed, we can take care of them.
â”€ Alright, looks like everything's fine.

They've used trendy colors,
so it'll really stand out on stage.
Ah, it was featured in that magazine I read the other day.

Yeah.
...The costume team put a lot of thought into it, huh?

Including that sentiment...
I'll do my best to make sure it reaches everyone.
